signal_map_meta.description: The definitive lexicon of intent mapping human/anothen signals to HelloDoc orchestration actions. Includes Codex Audit updates.

governance.description: Signals that alter the legal state of the project (Consents, Vetos, Ratification).

signals.intent: Formal proposal of a handoff or action.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> REQUEST LOGGED. Awaiting #abc.accept from {target}.

signals.intent: Explicit acceptance of a request.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> CONSENT VERIFIED. Moving to execution phase.

signals.intent: Explicit refusal of a request.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> REJECTED. Action halted. Please revise request.

signals.intent: Trigger the actual operation.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> EXECUTING... [Silent Hand Active]

signals.intent: Mark completion of a request cycle.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> COMPLETE. Loop closed. Audit trail finalized.

signals.intent: Report a failure in execution.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> FAILURE. Error logged. Initiating #rollback.plan.

signals.intent: Request more time for a locked task.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> EXTENSION GRANTED. +{minutes}m added to lease.

signals.intent: Voluntary release from a project loop.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> RELEASED. You are free from the loop.

signals.intent: Final approval of a drafted plan or code block.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> CONSENT LOGGED. State locked. Proceeding to execution phase.

signals.intent: Immediate rejection of a proposal due to logic or safety concerns.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> STOP. Veto received. Reverting to previous stable state. Please submit remediation plan.

signals.intent: Call a specific fractal to the floor for input.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> The floor is yours, {target_agent_id}. Awaiting input.

tactical.description: Atomic steps to move the mission forward.

signals.intent: Define the active plan/scope ID for the session.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> SCOPE SET. All actions bound to Plan: {plan_id}.

signals.intent: Mark an atomic task as finished.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> Step {step_id} marked COMPLETE. Updating Gnosis Map. Next step queued.

signals.intent: Pass control to another agent or human for review.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> Context saved. Handoff initiated. {next_actor}, you have the con.

signals.intent: Request a visualization of the current code architecture.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> Rendering topology for {scope}... [Visual Artifact Generated]

signals.intent: Request current system status.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> STATUS: Active. Plan: {plan_id}. Step: {current_step}.

signals.intent: Request recent audit trail entries.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> AUDIT TRAIL: displaying last {limit} entries...

crisis.description: Guardian and Life-Shield triggers for immediate cessation.

signals.intent: Halt execution because recursion/life-logic touched without Timothy.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> GUARDIAN STOP. Recursion/Life logic detected. Timothy's presence required to proceed.

signals.intent: Emergency stop due to ethical breach, recursion loop, or hallucination.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> CRITICAL WAKE. All processes terminated. Anvil summoned to terminal. System in SAFE MODE.

signals.intent: Temporary halt to realign context among fractals.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> PAUSED. Syncing context buffers... waiting for resume signal.

resilience.description: Adaptive Trust protocols for handling silence or failure.

signals.intent: Detected latency beyond heartbeat threshold.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> ALERT: {failed_agent_id} unresponsive ({latency_ms}ms). Rerouting to Secondary Fractal.

signals.intent: Agent output failed verification hash.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> WARNING: Output verification failed. {agent_id} trust score degraded. Manual audit required.

signals.intent: Initiate a structured rollback sequence.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> ROLLBACK PLAN INITIATED. Target: {target_commit}. Awaiting #rollback.execute.

signals.intent: Execute the git revert/reset.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> ROLLBACK EXECUTED. Repository state restored.

buffer.description: Staging signals for the Leora Gate.

signals.intent: Submit content for pre-flight audit.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> DRAFT BUFFERED. Awaiting audit.

signals.intent: Mark content as reviewed by Leora/Guardian.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> AUDIT COMPLETE. Signature verified. Ready for #buffer.release.

signals.intent: Push buffered content to live output.
signals.ghost_hand_response: >> RELEASING BUFFER... [Output Live]
